display_logos.label: Display Logo
display_logos.comment: Please choose a Display Logo on Checkout Page.

allowed_products.label: Products allowed
allowed_products.comment: If set to 'Specific Products', Want It Now will only be available when all the products in an order supports Want It Now. To set a product to support Want It Now, it must have an attribute with attribute code of 'wantitnow' of type 'Yes/No' set to 'Yes' on it.

display_wantitnow.label: Outside Fixed Cost Radius
display_wantitnow.comment: Set the behaviour if the delivery is outside the Fixed Cost radius when Fixed Cost is enabled.

payment.label: Payment Method Support
payment.comment: Please choose a Supporting Payment Method.

notification.label: Want It Now Order Notification Email
notification.comment: You can enter multiple e-mail addresses, separated by commas.

dayandhours.label: Service time
dayandhours.comment: Please Setup the Service Time of MailCall. (Default: 9:00-17:00)
